text.p: Oppenheimer Capital LP said Wednesday it declared a distribution of $1.15 per unit payable May 30 to holders of units of limited partnership interest at the close of business April 30.
This distribution consists of the partnership's regular quarterly distribution of $0.85 per unit and a special distribution from excess cash flow of $0.30 per unit, Oppenheimer said.
Today's declaration brings the total distributions for the fiscal year ending April 30, 1997, to $3.50 per unit, Oppenheimer said.
In the prior fiscal year the Partnership declared total distributions of $3.175 per unit, Oppenheimer said.
The partnership's current policy is to declare regular quarterly distribution of $0.85 per unit or $3.40 per unit annually and special distributions as warranted by cash flow, Oppenheimer said.
